meanings.definition: To change the structure or form of something
meanings.sent1: She is remodelling her room to make it more spacious.
meanings.sent2: The company is remodelling its website for a better user experience.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter joked that he was remodelling the chair to give it a new 'personality'.
meanings.sent4: The artist remodelling the sculpture breathed life into the stone.
meanings.sent5: The architect's vision for remodelling the old building was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The act of making changes to improve or update something
meanings.sent1: The remodelling of the kitchen was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: Home remodelling can increase the value of a property.
meanings.sent3: The remodelling of the garden turned it into a beautiful oasis.
meanings.sent4: The remodelling of the school curriculum brought positive results.
meanings.sent5: The remodelling of the store layout attracted more customers.
